title: Caprese Stuffed Avocados
directions: Cut avocados in half and remove pits
Scoop out slight amount of flesh to create larger cavity
Chop removed avocado and mix with tomatoes, mozzarella, basil
Stuff mixture back into avocado halves
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil
Season with salt and pepper
Serve immediately

title: Vegetarian Lentil Curry
directions: Rinse lentils thoroughly
Heat coconut oil in large pot over medium heat
Sauté onion until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute
Stir in curry powder and cook until fragrant
Add lentils, coconut milk, and vegetable broth
Bring to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted
Season with salt and serve over rice

title: Mushroom and Spinach Quesadillas
directions: Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat
Sauté onions and mushrooms until softened
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Stir in cumin and chili powder
Place tortillas on clean surface
Spread vegetable mixture on half of each tortilla
Sprinkle cheese over vegetables
Fold tortillas over and press gently
Cook in skillet until golden brown on both sides
Serve with sour cream

title: Keto Bacon Cheeseburger Casserole
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Brown ground beef with onion in skillet
Drain excess fat and transfer to baking dish
In bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, and mayonnaise
Stir in cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Pour egg mixture over ground beef
Top with crumbled bacon
Bake for 25-30 minutes until set
Let cool for 5 minutes before serving

title: Keto Garlic Butter Salmon
directions: Pat salmon fillets dry and season with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook salmon skin-side up for 4-5 minutes
Flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes
Remove salmon from skillet
Reduce heat to medium and melt butter
Add garlic and cook until fragrant
Stir in lemon juice and parsley
Return salmon to skillet and spoon sauce over
Serve with steamed asparagus

title: Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 1 large head cauliflower, cut into florets
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Steam cauliflower florets until tender-crisp
In saucepan, melt butter and cream cheese over low heat
Whisk in heavy cream until smooth
Stir in 1 1/2 cups cheddar cheese until melted
Add garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper
Combine cheese sauce with cauliflower in baking dish
Top with remaining cheddar cheese
Bake for 15-20 minutes until bubbly
Broil for 2-3 minutes for golden top

title: Gluten-Free Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
directions: Slice chicken into thin strips
Mix soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger
Heat oil in wok or large skillet over high heat
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, about 5-6 minutes
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp
Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables
Mix cornstarch with water and add to thicken sauce
Simmer for 2 minutes until sauce thickens
Serve over cooked rice

title: Gluten-Free Quinoa Salad
directions: Rinse quinoa thoroughly under cold water
Bring water to boil in saucepan
Add quinoa, reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes
Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes
Fluff with fork and let cool completely
In large bowl, combine cooled quinoa with vegetables
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss to combine
Stir in feta cheese and parsley
Chill for 30 minutes before serving

title: Gluten-Free Almond Flour Pancakes
directions: In large bowl, whisk together almond flour and baking powder
In separate bowl, beat eggs with almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla
Combine wet and dry ingredients, mix until smooth
Let batter rest for 5 minutes
Heat butter in non-stick skillet over medium heat
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
Cook until bubbles form on surface, about 2-3 minutes
Flip and cook until golden brown
Serve with fresh berries and additional maple syrup

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
directions: Rinse quinoa thoroughly under cold water
In saucepan, bring water to boil and add quinoa
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes
Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes, then fluff with fork
While quinoa cooks, prepare vegetables
In large bowl, combine cooked quinoa with cucumber, tomatoes, onion and olives
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt and pepper
Pour dressing over quinoa mixture and toss to combine
Top with crumbled feta cheese
Serve warm or chilled

title: Keto Garlic Butter Steak
directions: Remove steaks from refrigerator 30 minutes before cooking
Pat steaks dry and season generously with salt and pepper
Heat cast iron skillet over high heat for 5 minutes
Add avocado oil and swirl to coat
Sear steaks for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare
Reduce heat to medium and add butter, garlic and rosemary
Spoon butter sauce over steaks continuously for 1 minute
Remove steaks and let rest for 10 minutes
In same skillet, cook asparagus until tender-crisp
Sprinkle asparagus with parmesan cheese
Serve steak with asparagus and drizzle with garlic butter sauce

title: Gluten-Free Chicken Stir Fry
directions: Slice chicken breast into thin strips
In small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, garlic and ginger
Heat wok or large skillet over high heat
Add 1 tablespoon oil and stir-fry chicken until cooked through, 5-6 minutes
Remove chicken and set aside
Add vegetables to wok and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until tender-crisp
Return chicken to wok
Mix cornstarch with water and add to sauce mixture
Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables
Cook until sauce thickens, about 2 minutes
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds
Serve immediately

title: Low-Calorie Greek Salad
directions: Wash and chop all vegetables
In large salad bowl, combine lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, onion and olives
In small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently
Crumble feta cheese over top
Serve immediately

title: High-Calorie Protein Power Bowl
directions: Cook brown rice according to package directions
Season steak with salt, pepper and chili powder
Grill or pan-sear steak to desired doneness, let rest then slice
Fry eggs sunny-side up or over easy
Heat black beans and corn in small saucepan
Assemble bowls with rice as base
Top with sliced steak, avocado, beans, corn and fried egg
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice
Serve immediately

title: High-Protein Egg White Frittata
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Heat olive oil in oven-safe skillet over medium heat
Sauté vegetables until tender, about 5 minutes
Add spinach and cook until wilted
In bowl, whisk egg whites with cottage cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper
Pour egg mixture over vegetables in skillet
Cook without stirring for 3-4 minutes until edges set
Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top
Transfer skillet to oven and bake for 12-15 minutes until set
Let cool for 5 minutes before slicing

title: Quick Italian Caprese Salad
directions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into 1/4-inch thick slices
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on serving platter
Tuck fresh basil leaves between slices
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze
Season with sea salt and black pepper
Serve immediately

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
directions: Slice steak against the grain into thin strips
In bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, brown sugar and cornstarch
Heat 1 tbsp oil in wok over high heat
Stir-fry beef until browned, 2-3 minutes, remove and set aside
Add remaining oil and stir-fry broccoli for 3 minutes
Add water, cover and steam for 2 minutes
Return beef to wok, add sauce mixture
Cook until sauce thickens, about 1-2 minutes
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice

title: Classic Beef Tacos
directions: Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat
Brown ground beef, breaking it up with spoon
Drain excess fat from beef
Add taco seasoning and water according to package directions
Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened
Warm taco shells according to package directions
Fill shells with seasoned beef
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream and salsa
Serve immediately

title: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken (Pad Krapow)
directions: Heat oil in wok over high heat
Add garlic and chilies, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add ground chicken and break it up, cook until no longer pink
Add onion and cook for 2 minutes
Add fish sauce, soy sauce, and sugar, mix well
Add basil leaves and stir until wilted
In separate pan, fry eggs sunny-side up
Serve chicken over jasmine rice topped with fried egg

title: Keto Buffalo Chicken Dip
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
In mixing bowl, combine cream cheese, hot sauce, and ranch dressing
Stir in shredded chicken, half the cheddar cheese, and garlic powder
Transfer to baking dish and top with remaining cheddar and blue cheese
Bake for 20-25 minutes until bubbly and golden
Garnish with green onions
Serve with celery sticks for dipping

title: Mediterranean Stuffed Bell Peppers
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds
In bowl, mix cooked quinoa, chickpeas, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt and pepper
Pour dressing over quinoa mixture and combine well
Stuff mixture into bell peppers
Place in baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes
Top with feta cheese and bake additional 5 minutes
Serve warm

title: Gluten-Free Banana Almond Pancakes
directions: In bowl, mash bananas until smooth
Whisk in eggs, almond milk, and vanilla extract
In separate bowl, mix almond flour, baking powder, and cinnamon
Combine wet and dry ingredients, mix until smooth
Heat butter in non-stick skillet over medium heat
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
Cook until bubbles form on surface, about 2-3 minutes
Flip and cook until golden brown
Serve with fresh berries and maple syrup

title: Keto Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
directions: Spiralize zucchinis into noodles
In food processor, combine basil, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan
Pulse while slowly adding olive oil until smooth
Add lemon juice, salt and pepper to pesto
In large skillet, melt butter over medium heat
Add zucchini noodles and cook for 2-3 minutes until tender
Remove from heat and toss with pesto sauce
Garnish with cherry tomatoes and extra parmesan
Serve immediately

title: High-Protein Turkey Chili
directions: In large pot, brown ground turkey over medium heat
Add onion, garlic, and bell pepper, cook until softened
Add chili powder, cumin, and paprika, cook for 1 minute
Add beans, crushed tomatoes, and chicken broth
Bring to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with optional toppings like Greek yogurt or avocado

title: Vegetarian Mushroom Risotto
directions: Heat vegetable broth in separate saucepan and keep warm
In large pot, heat olive oil and 1 tbsp butter over medium heat
Add mushrooms and cook until browned, remove and set aside
Add onion and garlic, cook until translucent
Add arborio rice and toast for 2 minutes
Pour in white wine and stir until absorbed
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Continue adding broth until rice is creamy and al dente (about 20 minutes)
Stir in mushrooms, remaining butter, and parmesan cheese
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately

title: Keto Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
directions: Pat salmon dry and season with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in skillet over medium-high heat
Cook salmon skin-side down for 4-5 minutes
Flip and cook for 3-4 minutes until cooked through
Remove salmon from skillet
Reduce heat to medium and melt butter
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add lemon juice, zest, dill, and capers
Return salmon to skillet and spoon sauce over
Serve with steamed asparagus

title: Gluten-Free Chicken Parmesan
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Set up breading station: almond flour, beaten eggs, and breadcrumbs mixed with Italian seasoning
Season chicken with salt and pepper
Dredge chicken in almond flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs
Heat olive oil in oven-safe skillet over medium heat
Cook chicken for 3-4 minutes per side until golden
Top with marinara sauce and cheeses
Transfer skillet to oven and bake for 10-12 minutes until cheese melts
Serve with zucchini noodles or salad

title: Vegetarian Black Bean Burgers
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Mash black beans in bowl, leaving some chunks for texture
Add breadcrumbs, onion, garlic, egg, and spices
Mix until well combined and form into 4 patties
Chill patties in refrigerator for 30 minutes
Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat
Cook patties for 4-5 minutes per side until golden and heated through
Toast burger buns
Assemble burgers with lettuce, tomato, and avocado
Serve immediately

title: Keto Bacon Avocado Salad
directions: Cook bacon until crispy, then crumble
Hard-boil eggs, cool, peel and quarter
In large salad bowl, combine mixed greens, avocado, tomatoes, and onion
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper for dressing
Add bacon, eggs, and blue cheese to salad
Drizzle with dressing and toss gently
Serve immediately

title: Gluten-Free Shrimp Scampi
directions: Cook gluten-free pasta according to package directions
While pasta cooks, pat shrimp dry and season with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil and 2 tbsp butter in large skillet over medium-high heat
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until pink, remove and set aside
Add garlic and red pepper flakes to skillet, cook for 30 seconds
Pour in white wine and lemon juice, simmer for 2 minutes
Whisk in remaining butter until melted and sauce thickens slightly
Return shrimp to skillet, add cooked pasta and parsley
Toss everything together and serve immediately

title: Korean Beef Bulgogi Bowls
directions: In bowl, mix soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, garlic, and grated pear
Add sliced steak and marinate for 30 minutes
Heat large skillet or wok over high heat
Cook steak in batches until caramelized, about 2-3 minutes per batch
Add onions and carrots, stir-fry for 2 minutes
Serve over rice, garnish with green onions and sesame seeds

title: Keto Cauliflower Fried Rice
directions: Rice cauliflower in food processor or with grater
Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy, remove and set aside
In same skillet, scramble eggs, remove and set aside
Add garlic and ginger to skillet, cook for 30 seconds
Add carrots and peas, cook for 3 minutes
Add cauliflower rice and cook for 5-7 minutes until tender
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil
Return bacon and eggs to skillet
Garnish with green onions and serve

title: Mediterranean Lentil Soup
directions: Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat
Add onion, carrots, and celery, cook until softened
Add garlic and spices, cook for 1 minute until fragrant
Add lentils, vegetable broth, and diced tomatoes
Bring to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
Stir in lemon juice and parsley
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve with crusty bread

title: Gluten-Free Chicken Alfredo
directions: Cook gluten-free pasta according to package directions
Season chicken with salt and pepper
In large skillet, melt 2 tbsp butter over medium heat
Cook chicken until golden and cooked through, remove and set aside
Add remaining butter and garlic to skillet, cook for 1 minute
Pour in heavy cream and bring to simmer
Whisk in parmesan cheese until melted and smooth
Add nutmeg, salt, and pepper
Return chicken to sauce, add cooked pasta
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately

title: Vegetarian Tofu Scramble
directions: Press tofu to remove excess water, then crumble
Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat
Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened
Add crumbled tofu and cook for 5 minutes
Stir in turmeric, garlic powder, and nutritional yeast
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Season with black salt and regular salt to taste
Garnish with fresh chives
Serve with toast or breakfast potatoes

title: Keto Steak Salad with Blue Cheese
directions: Season steak generously with salt and pepper
Grill or pan-sear steak to desired doneness, let rest then slice
In large bowl, combine mixed greens, onion, and cucumber
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and garlic for dressing
Toss salad with dressing
Top with sliced steak, blue cheese, and walnuts
Serve immediately

title: Gluten-Free Banana Bread
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Grease loaf pan with coconut oil
In bowl, mash bananas until smooth
Whisk in eggs, maple syrup, coconut oil, and vanilla
In separate bowl, mix almond flour, baking soda, and cinnamon
Combine wet and dry ingredients, mix until just combined
Fold in walnuts
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan
Bake for 45-50 minutes until toothpick comes out clean
Cool in pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to wire rack

title: Vegetarian Eggplant Parmesan
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Salt eggplant slices and let sit for 30 minutes, then pat dry
Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, breadcrumbs
Dredge eggplant in flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs
Heat olive oil in skillet and fry eggplant until golden on both sides
In baking dish, spread layer of marinara sauce
Layer eggplant slices, sauce, and cheeses
Repeat layers, ending with cheese
Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden
Garnish with fresh basil

title: Keto Chicken Cordon Bleu
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Butterfly chicken breasts and pound to even thickness
Layer ham and Swiss cheese inside each chicken breast
Fold chicken over filling and secure with toothpicks
Mix crushed pork rinds, parmesan, garlic powder, and paprika
Dip chicken in beaten eggs, then coat with pork rind mixture
Place in baking dish and drizzle with melted butter
Bake for 25-30 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F
Remove toothpicks before serving

title: Gluten-Free Fish Tacos
directions: Cut fish into strips and season with chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat
Cook fish for 3-4 minutes per side until flaky
Warm corn tortillas according to package directions
Mix Greek yogurt with lime juice for sauce
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, avocado, and onion
Drizzle with yogurt sauce
Serve with lime wedges

title: High-Protein Greek Yogurt Chicken Salad
directions: Shred cooked chicken into small pieces
In large bowl, mix Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and dill
Add chicken, celery, onion, almonds, and cranberries
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving
Serve on bread, in lettuce wraps, or with crackers

title: Keto Zucchini Lasagna
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Salt zucchini slices and let sit for 15 minutes, then pat dry
Brown ground beef with garlic, drain excess fat
Add marinara sauce to beef and simmer for 5 minutes
Mix ricotta cheese with egg and Italian seasoning
In baking dish, layer zucchini, beef sauce, ricotta mixture, and mozzarella
Repeat layers, ending with mozzarella and parmesan
Bake for 35-40 minutes until bubbly and golden
Let rest for 10 minutes before serving

title: Vegetarian Chickpea Curry
directions: Heat coconut oil in large pot over medium heat
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, and cayenne
Add chickpeas and coconut milk, bring to simmer
Cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Garnish with fresh cilantro
Serve over rice or with naan bread

title: Gluten-Free Pizza Crust
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Line pizza pan with parchment paper
In bowl, mix almond flour, coconut flour, baking powder, and seasonings
Add eggs and olive oil, mix until dough forms
Press dough into pizza shape on prepared pan
Bake for 12-15 minutes until lightly golden
Add desired toppings
Bake additional 10-12 minutes until cheese melts
Let cool for 5 minutes before slicing

title: Keto Chocolate Avocado Mousse
ingredients: 1/4 cup erythritol or monk fruit sweetener
directions: Scoop avocado flesh into food processor
Add cocoa powder, sweetener, coconut cream, and coconut oil
Blend until completely smooth and creamy
Add vanilla extract and salt, blend to combine
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving
Top with whipped cream and shaved dark chocolate

title: High-Protein Turkey Meatballs
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
In bowl, combine turkey, breadcrumbs, parmesan, egg, garlic, and herbs
Form into 1-inch meatballs
Heat olive oil in oven-safe skillet
Brown meatballs on all sides, about 5 minutes total
Pour marinara sauce over meatballs
Transfer skillet to oven and bake for 15-20 minutes
Serve over pasta or zucchini noodles

title: Vegetarian Mexican Stuffed Peppers
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds
In bowl, mix quinoa, black beans, corn, salsa, and spices
Stuff mixture into bell peppers
Place in baking dish and add 1/4 cup water to bottom
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes
Remove foil, top with cheese, bake additional 10 minutes
Garnish with cilantro before serving

title: Keto Bacon Cheeseburger Soup
directions: Cook bacon in large pot until crispy, remove and set aside
In bacon fat, brown ground beef with onion and garlic
Drain excess fat if needed
Add tomato paste and paprika, cook for 1 minute
Add beef broth and bring to simmer
Stir in heavy cream and cheddar cheese until melted
Simmer for 15 minutes, do not boil
Garnish with bacon and parsley before serving

title: Gluten-Free Coconut Shrimp
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1/4 cup sweet chili sauce for dipping
directions: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels
Set up breading station: almond flour mixed with spices, beaten eggs, shredded coconut
Dredge shrimp in almond flour, then egg, then press into coconut
Heat coconut oil in skillet over medium heat
Fry shrimp in batches for 2-3 minutes per side until golden
Drain on paper towels
Serve with sweet chili sauce for dipping

title: High-Protein Breakfast Burritos
directions: Cook sausage in skillet until browned, remove and set aside
In same skillet, sauté peppers and onions until softened
Whisk eggs and pour into skillet with vegetables
Scramble eggs until cooked through
Return sausage to skillet, mix well
Warm tortillas according to package directions
Divide egg mixture among tortillas, top with cheese
Roll up burrito-style
Serve with salsa on the side
